pkgmetadata.longdescription: Dyadic Network Analysis // Includes a function for estimation of the p2 model (van Duijn, Snijders and Zijlstra (2004) doi:10.1046/j.0039-0402.2003.00258.x), more specifically, the adaptive random walk algorithm (Zijlstra, van Duijn and Snijders (2009) doi:10.1348/000711007X255336).
